IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED
		  STATES

official-title.#text:
Extending the life of the Joint
		  Congressional Committee on Inaugural Ceremonies.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, to make the necessary arrangements for the inauguration of
			 the President-elect and the Vice President-elect of the United States, is
			 continued with the same power and authority provided for in that
			 resolution.

text.#text:
Effective from

, to authorize the use of the rotunda and Emancipation Hall of the

in

			 continued with the same power and authority provided for in that
